title: [LiveLogger] logger should report build time.
body:
LiveLogger should report build time after the build, as it is done by Console Logger:
```
Build succeeded.
    0 Warning(s)
    0 Error(s)

Time Elapsed 00:00:00.89
```

nodes.body: We should have the elapsed time, but we do have freedom in formatting--it doesn't have to match the existing output.
